capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Petunia has a bit of a reputation going around. Apparently, she's always dishing out the latest gossip to anyone who will listen. I'm not sure if it's entirely true, but from what I've seen, Petunia does seem to know all the juicy details.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville does look a bit round in the face. I've noticed that about him before.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's gender is indeed male. I've always found it interesting how J.K. Rowling chose to make him a half-giant, and his masculinity plays such an important role in the series.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. you're a man, right valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid is indeed quite tall for a half-giant. I mean, he's got to be one of the tallest people in the wizarding world, right? It's pretty surprising when you think about it, considering how gentle and kind-hearted he is.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in the school. I mean, he towers over most of our professors! (laughs) The way the teachers look at him is almost comical, like they're trying to see around his head or something.
